dataAccessDetails: Only basic search and PDF, no open data section found. Different details present on webpage and PDF. User needs to check both for full account
exampleIdentifiers: Charities - CH1, CH144, CH545 / NPOs - NP3, NP126, NP219
guidanceOnLocatingIds: Users can scroll down the two public lists to search for an organisation, or they can use 'Ctrl-F' to search for a name. The identifier can be found in the left hand column under the header 'Number'
onlineAccessDetails: Users can search for a company and then download a PDF of the charity/NPO statement
description:
The Guernsey Registry maintain a registry of all charities and all NPOs in Guernsey. These are recorded in two separate lists - Charities and NPOs.

"The Charities and Non Profit Organisation (Registration) (Guernsey) Law, 2008 requires all Non Profit organisations based in the Islands of Guernsey, Alderney, Herm and Jethou to register with the Office of the Registrar. A failure to do so is an offence.

However there is an exemption from this requirement. This applies to Non Profit organisations based in the Islands of Guernsey, Alderney, Herm and Jethou with gross assets and funds of less than £10,000, or gross annual income of less than £5,000." [1]

[1] http://www.guernseyregistry.com/article/112911/Do-I-need-to-register-a-Charity-or-Non-Profit-organisation-
name: The Guernsey Registry at the Department of Commerce and Employment (Charities)
